GSD.description:
ext4: check if directory block is within i_size

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 1571c4613059fce2a02508bb8206af75e24c0d58. For more details please see the references link.
